text:
THE UNIVERSITY OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK
THE STATE EDUCATION DEPARTMENT
ALBANY, NEW YORK 12201
DIVISION OF EDUCATIONAL COMMUNICATIONS
LEE E. CAMPION, DIRECTOR
GR 4-5823
December 3, 1963
Miss Marion Corwell
Chairman, Public Relations Committee
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Ave., N.W.
Washington, D. C.
Dear Marion:
I am sorry I was unable to attend your Committee
Meeting on Wednesday, November 20 in Milwaukee. It was
necessary for me to get back to Albany.
I would appreciate learning what was discussed. I
would also like to offer my services in any capacity you
see fit.
I hope, in the near future, I can be a more active
member on the Committee.
Sincerely yours,
c
Lee E. Campion1
Director
LEC:rt
